text: The Volán companies () were a network of transit companies operating intercity, international and city bus lines in Hungary. One Volán company generally served only the area of a specific county. The companies formed from the merger of regional Auto Transit Companies () and Cargo Shipping Companies (). == See also == * Budapesti Közlekedési Központ * BKV Zrt. == References == Category:Public transport companies in Hungary
title: Volán
